meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Kyle Ogden, President and Chief Executive Officer, The Thanks-Giving Foundation
Heather Lowe, Interim Director, Dallas Public Library
Martine Eylse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Jennifer Nicewander, Director, Office of Bond and Construction Management
Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion
participants: Sean McGrew, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library
Kjerstine Nielsen-Pelto, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library
Sallie Lockhart, Assistant Director, Dallas Public Library
Glenn Ayars, Assistant Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Russell Dyer, Superintendent of Facilities, Office of Arts and Culture
Candi Green, Assistant Director, Office of Bond and Construction Management

agenda_items.title: Establishment of The Thanks-Giving Square District at Thanks-Giving Square
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the significance of Thanks-Giving Square and the proposal to create The Thanks-Giving District.

agenda_items.title: Developing a Quality of Life Strategy - Library Strategic Plan
agenda_items.description: Updates on the Library's strategic plan and its alignment with city priorities.

agenda_items.title: City Facilities Partners Update - Dallas Museum of Art
agenda_items.description: Update on the partnership and management agreement with the Dallas Museum of Art.

agenda_items.title: Public Restroom Accessibility Renovations at Various City Facilities
agenda_items.description: Request to authorize a design-build construction contract for restroom accessibility renovations.

agenda_items.title: Acceptance of NLC FY25 Cities Addressing Fines and Fees Equitably (CAFFE) Initiative Grant
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the acceptance of a grant to address fines and fees with an equity-informed lens.

financial_items.description: Design-build construction contract for restroom accessibility renovations
